results.content: The explanation is horrible. I mean, it is not a deep explanation to angular just, mongoDB or Node.Js , just an overview of everything. Mongodb explanation is the worst part that I didn't expect this, as lecturer jumped through different parts. for example, he did not explain any thing about how to create his database, just went fast through mongoose connection codes and creating Schema. Although No one expect a real course from 3 hours, at lease I expected a more clear explanation for these few parts.

results.content: It wasn't bad.  I liked how the instructor got done to the basics of MEAN.  Even though I know there were shortcuts that would've been helpful to include in the course and the typos were a little irksome to me, I felt the instructor did what he set out to do in this course.
